channel.title: Getting the 194 client started up
channel.description:
I'm trying to get a RS 194 server started (from scratch) or at least the client working.
I've downloaded the client and cache and put the cache files in a ".file_store_32" folder but all I get when trying to run is "Error loading - retrying in 5 secs."
I've decompiled the client and looked in signlink.java and AFAIK it's looking in the right place for the cache.
I realize this post sounds sort of noobish but I do have knowledge of Java and what's going on.
Can someone help me?
(originally posted at Moparisthebest and they told me it would be better over here)

item.title: Getting the 194 client started up
item.dc:creator: @Tekk123 Tekk
item.description:
@Tekk123 wrote:

I’m trying to get a RS 194 server started (from scratch) or at least the client working.

I’ve downloaded the client and cache and put the cache files in a “.file_store_32” folder but all I get when trying to run is “Error loading - retrying in 5 secs.”

I’ve decompiled the client and looked in signlink.java and AFAIK it’s looking in the right place for the cache.

I realize this post sounds sort of noobish but I do have knowledge of Java and what’s going on.

Can someone help me?
